contact:Person.contact:fullName: I. Herman, W3C, Head of Offices

svg.title: Concatenation Examples
SVG Transformation example
svg.desc: A set of transformed ducks, each labelled with the corresponding transformation sequences. The original image is in the middle.

g.desc: The collection of all the transformation examples
The original duck, without any transformation
A scaling first then a translation
A scale, followed by a skew in X and a translation
A scale, followed by a skew in Y and a translation
An example when a general matrix is used

g.text: I. Herman, W3C, Head of Offices,; © 1994-2004, W3C (MIT,ERCIM,Keio)
